job.title: Data Scientist - Computer Vision
job.description: pAtos zData an elite artificial intelligence consulting group is expanding its data science team and is hiring Senior Data Scientists that have experience with Computer Vision The primary focus of this position will be on researching new techniques for computer vision and applying computer vision techniques to real world problems You also may be applying cutting edge approaches in other areas as well such as natural language processing machine learning and time series analysis to solve some of the most challenging problems across a wide variety of industries We see this position as an exciting opportunity for you to demonstrate your differentiated data science skills but also learn new skills as the data science field develops quicklyppbrppAs part of this team you will be part of a vibrant community of other data scientists that are experts in their respective fields and data architects with significant realworld experience in building largescale data systems We have scheduled research discussion groups open communication in Slack and a culture based on being helpful We believe this supportive community approach is the only way to keep up with the field and solve some of our customers biggest problemsppbrppYour work will be remote from your home office working with a distributed group of engineers and data scientists across the world Work schedules can be flexible given the consulting and work from home nature of the position There is no travel expectation at this time due to the COVID19 pandemic but some travel to customer sites may be required once normal conditions returnppbrppstrongObjectives of this RolestrongpulliResearch and apply computer vision techniquesliliArchitect endtoend artificial intelligence solutionsliliPerform exploratory data analysis and present results to business stakeholdersliliImplement machine learning modelsliliPerform largescale data analysis on cloudbased data platformsliliWork with business stakeholders to devise guide evaluate and build data science solutionsnbspliulpbrppbrppstrongSkills and QualificationsstrongpulliPhD in a scientific discipline that uses data preferred but not requiredliliExperience with computer vision and deep learningliliGeneral experience with machine learningliliExpertise in AWS or Google cloud preferred but we will train if necessaryliliExpertise in SQLdatabases andor HadoopSpark but we will train if necessaryliliStrong communication skills and customer management skillsliulpbrp
